title: You can pick up cold and flu from surfaces for up to 48 hours. #LysolThat to help protect your home
description: Did you know you could pick up cold and flu viruses from things in your home for up to 48 hours? It’s like having a sick family member that you didn’t even know was there. But Lysol Spray and Lysol Wipes kill 99.9% of germs including 8 common cold and flu viruses, to help protect your home. This cold and flu season help keep your home happy and healthy and Lysol that!
